description:
Summary:

On opening the app, the word "Beneficiaries" is coming in 2 lines. Its looking very odd.

Steps to reproduce:

Remove the default padding in the layout, and replace it by giving margin in the imageview.

Expected behaviour:

The word "Beneficiaries" should come in 1 line.

Observed behaviour:

The word "Beneficiaries" is coming in 2 lines.
name: Mifos Mobile: "Beneficiaries" coming in two lines
